MyCaptain Internship

August 1, 2018

Categories

  • internship

MyCaptain Discover is a program for school students to discover their interests, explore the various fields in which they can make a career in and interact with young mentors who have made their mark in the field.

We are hiring content writing interns to make Discover what we dream it to be. If you have the drive and passion for writing and also want to learn the tricks of the trade while you are at it, this is the place for you!

Apply here to intern with us.
